name: Moonstone Crossroads
description:
Welcome to Moonstone Crossroads! In this open world game, you will be able to "cross" between various in-depth activities such as farming, hunting, mini-games and more! You will take the role of an organic being among a world of mechanical beings. As an organic being, the inhabitants depend on you to be able to do most of the tasks they are unable to do. You can choose to try to master them all, or simply choose one road. The crossroads are only beginning in: Moonstone Crossroads...

Features:
-Companion Lazuli
-Farming system
-Weapons (Arm cannon, Blunderbuss, slingshot)
-Duck hunting
-Day&Night system
-Slingshot Mini-game
-Climbing: Trees&ladders
-In-Game tablet with various apps
-Gadgets: (Drone, Binoculars)
-Inventory system
